name: Sword of Legend
description:
You have travelled to that place where the Sword of Legend stands, now you just need to take it and bring it home, but that won't prove so easy!!

This is an arcade game made in three days by one person as a gamedev challenge. The theme for this jam was: "ENTIRE GAME ON ONE SCREEN".

There are obvious shortcomings due to the time constraint and team size (solo), but the core game is playable and somewhat enjoyable. Leave a comment if you want me to polish it some more or add more features, I have many ideas and things planned that I wasn't able to make in time.

CONTROLS:

Use the arrowkeys on your keyboard to move. That's it.

HOW TO PLAY:

Attack enemies by moving into them, but if you try to attack from the front, you will die, so sneak around them!!

As you progress, time will go faster and faster, which means enemies will move and spawn faster. Try to keep your cool and plan your route quickly and efficiently.

POWERUPS:

COINS - awards points

SHIELD - invulnerable for a small period

SCROLL OF TIME - make time go slower
